news.title: Microsoft faces uphill climb to turn enterprise dominance into widespread AI chatbot adoption
news.summary: IT buyers explain why Microsoft isn't seeing runaway success with its Copilot AI assistant. At Microsoft's annual Ignite conference this week, IT buyers explained why.

news.title: 'Stakes are high.' With shutdown over, airlines predict record numbers of travelers this Thanksgiving
news.summary: Airline executives are hoping for a smooth Thanksgiving after a rocky fall because of the government shutdown. Airline executives hope for a smoother Thanksgiving after rocky fall due to the shutdown.

news.title: Texas data center expansion raises blackout risk during extreme winter weather
news.summary: Texas' supply and demand balance can become tight during winter and potentially fall into deficit as data center demand grows. Texas is home to more data centers than any other U.S. state.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 stocks for solid upside potential
news.summary: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three stocks favored by Wall Street. Microsoft and Booking Holdings are two of the three stocks discussed.

news.title: College grads face one of the toughest job markets in a decade — 'Right now is a really difficult time to find a job,' expert says
news.summary: This year, those armed with a newly minted diploma face one of the toughest job markets in a decade. This year, the U.S. is expected to have one of its highest unemployment rates in years.

news.title: ‘We almost lost $10,000’: My late father-in-law’s company claimed his life-insurance policy didn’t exist. It did.
news.summary: “The company changed names several times, and it was very difficult tracking them down for payment of benefits,” he said. “It’s very difficult to track them down.”

news.title: ‘My retirement is completely in bitcoin’: Why don’t more people do what I do?
news.summary: “I also borrow against bitcoin. What’s the catch?” he asks. “‘I also lend against bitcoin?’’ “I’m like, ‘Yes,’ he says. ‘I do.’ I’ve borrowed against bitcoin, too.”

news.title: ‘There’s a lot of tension’: My brother and I manage a $5 million trust. How do we solve our many disagreements?
news.summary: “We have a good estate attorney, but he just repeats the facts,” she says. “We need someone to help with the feelings”

news.title: ‘I’ve always lived hand-to-mouth’: I’m 64. My father left me $400K from his 457(b) plan. My brother is suing me. How can I defend myself?
news.summary: “I live off my Social Security of $900 a month,” he says. “I’m very happy. I’ve been through a lot.”

news.title: Americans’ happiness is at a record low. Are we just using our money the wrong way?
news.summary: Fewer than half of Americans say they are financially secure, according to a new survey. The survey also found that Americans are less satisfied with their quality of life.
